about.title: About me
about.description: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in modern web technologies.
about.personalDescription: Hi, I'm Hassen Ben Hadj Hassen, a passionate software developer with 3+ years of experience specializing in modern web technologies. I excel at building scalable, high-performance applications using React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. My expertise spans full-stack development, with a focus on creating intuitive user experiences and robust backend systems. I'm committed to writing clean, maintainable code and staying current with industry best practices. When I'm not coding, I enjoy:

activities.learning: Continuous learning and staying ahead of tech trends
